entry.title: $2360 // Close to the Q, 4/5/6 Subway Lines!
entry.content:
238 E 88th St | www.aimconyc.com
Apartment 5S
1 bedroom / 1 bathroom
$2360.16 a month!

***NO FEE***OWNER MANAGED***PET FRIENDLY***GUARANTORS WELCOME***
*PRICE SHOWN IS THE NET EFFECTIVE RENT WITH 1 MONTH FREE ON AN 18 MONTH LEASE*

Renovated one bedroom in a pet friendly building just one flight up and located in the heart of the upper east side! Close to the Q, 4/5/6 subway lines. Near endless dining and entertainment options.

This apartment features:
-hardwood flooring
-dishwasher
-full size appliances
-3 closets for storage
-quiet
-updated tiled bathroom

Price and availability are subject to change.
Equal Housing Opportunity
Professionally Managed by OP Property Management, LLC
